thread.title: Theodore
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Theodore

author: Theodore
title: Theodore
text: I demo,ed Elan ripstick 96 174 long . After I skied 8 to 10 pairs I decided to buy the Ripstick. I have been skiing for over 40 years now and the Ripstick is the best ski that I have ever used ! The price was great and the shipping was fast ! Eriks will be My one stop skishop in the future !!! Ted G
